on reading compounds: 迷惑【メイワク】trouble, bother, annoyance, nuisance, inconvenience, to be troubled (by), to be bothered (by), to be inconvenienced (by)
迷路【メイロ】maze, labyrinth, blind alley
混迷【コンメイ】turmoil, chaos, confusion
愛迷【アイメイ】straying from love, falling out of love, lost love
kun reading compounds: 迷う【まよう】to lose one's way, to waver, to hesitate, to be of two minds over, to be puzzled, to be perplexed, to give into temptation, to lose control of oneself, to be charmed, to be infatuated, to be captivated, to be smitten, to turn in one's grave
